title: SMNTY Classics: A Slumber Party Podcast on Sleepovers
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: A Slumber Party Podcast on Sleepovers
description:
Sleepovers became popular in the U.S. in the 1950s, and over time they've become a tradition. How do you know when your kid is ready for sleepovers? Are co-ed sleepovers kosher? Tune in to this classic episode to learn more with Caroline and Cristen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
